channel.title: DODIAN XIV UB3R SERVER! - no premium required
channel.description:
Dodian, aka ub3r server, is a server that will never be forgotten in the RSPS community. It was a server that changed RSPS's forever, and was taken from us. Sadly today, there aren't many real old school servers out there, let alone servers similar to Dodian. XIV wishes to fill that empty gap that has recently come for the older generation players, and the new who enjoy the older content.
Our goal is to establish a Dodian community again, but better than the original server ever was. We have features on our server that were never on the original Dodian server. We are proud to say that we are the most advanced Dodian re-make ever made. We do not sell donator or member features(nor will we ever) so everyone can enjoy the server! Our skilling system is unlike most servers because of all the content. If you enjoyed the original server or any other re makes, I can guarantee that Dodian XIV will be the most fun you will have. So come try us out, and experience the revival of one of the greatest servers ever. Forums: www.dodianxiv.com Client Download: www.dodianxiv.com/dodianxiv.jar
[center]server features![/center] [center][center]Original Dodian NPC Spawns Young Economy Highscores 100% Global Dueling+Staking 100% thieving, stalls and NPCs Boss Key System Working Skill Guides Working Ess Pouches Working Potions Working special attacks Every enchanted item works! PKing 100% Farming 100% Ranging weapons, including knives, darts, thrownaxes, javelins, and Obby rings! 100% Magic, every spell works and auto casting! 100% Weapon Specials Advanced Slayer task system with tips Multiple Slayer Dungeons and Masters Multiple Bosses Multiple Entertaining Mini Games Multiple Random Events 100% Working Abyss Advanced teleporting system Every skill working except agility Loads of more content to keep you hooked![/center] [center]20 working skills[/center] Every skill listed works 100% Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Farming Herblore Thieving Crafting Fletching Slayer Melee Ranging Ancient Magic Prayer training Runecrafting[/center]

@versace06 wrote:

Dodian, aka ub3r server, is a server that will never be forgotten in the RSPS community. It was a server that changed RSPS’s forever, and was taken from us. Sadly today, there aren’t many real old school servers out there, let alone servers similar to Dodian. XIV wishes to fill that empty gap that has recently come for the older generation players, and the new who enjoy the older content.

Our goal is to establish a Dodian community again, but better than the original server ever was. We have features on our server that were never on the original Dodian server.
